title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 346.3 - Statement of respondent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 346.3 - Statement of respondent

State Regulations
(a) When an order of support is payable
through the SCU, the respondent shall provide the SCU with the following
information: (1)
name; (2)
address of residence; (3)
social security number; (4)
date of birth; (5)
place of employment; and
(6)
such other data as may be determined by
the department to be pertinent. (b) The respondent shall be informed of the
payment regulations of the SCU. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
346.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
